item.title: U.S. expands tariff dragnet to masks, syringes and robotics in sweeping import probe
item.description: The Trump administration has launched investigations into imports of robotics, industrial machinery and medical devices, paving the way for fresh tari...

item.title: U.S. Latino immigrants generate $1.6 trillion in GDP, report says
item.description: Mass deportations of undocumented workers could cause GDP to decline by $2.3 trillion, or 7.7%, in 2025 dollars, according to the report.

item.title: Fed Chief Powell says stock prices appear 'fairly highly valued'
item.description: Powell on Tuesday noted that asset prices, a category that typically includes stocks and other risk instruments, are at elevated levels.

item.title: U.S. and global growth forecast lifted by OECD as economies surprise to the upside
item.description: The OECD noted that many economies have been more resilient than expected so far this year.

item.title: The Fed cut its interest rate, but long-term rates — including those on mortgages — went higher
item.description: Ten- and 30-year Treasury yields rose this week after the central bank cut its short-term interest rate.
